name: Insane Joyriding in a Jet Powered Bathtub through Hyperspace
name_original: Insane Joyriding in a Jet Powered Bathtub through Hyperspace
description:
Insane Joyriding in a Jet Powered Bathtub through Hyperspace tells the tale of Mr Insane and his mishappenings with a bathtub that travels at ridiculous speeds.

Guide him as he is flown around in Hyperspace, avoiding the asteroids and rockets that fly at him, whilst trying to collect coins for more points, hearts for more health and powerups for special tricks!

Includes Game Jolt highscores.
